import styles from './CommentItem.module.css'; export const CommentItem = ({ comment, userId }) => { return (

{comment.fields.ownerName}

Likes: {comment.fields.likes.length} Dislikes: {comment.fields.dislikes.length}
{userId === comment.fields.ownerId ? <> : <> }

{comment.fields.commentContent}

); }
